name: Mango Tree
description: A fast-growing tropical tree that produces delicious, juicy mangoes during summer. Its dense green canopy offers shade, while its sweet fruits are rich in vitamins and minerals.

name: Banana Tree
description: A tropical plant known for its large leaves and sweet bananas. It grows quickly and thrives in warm, humid climates.

name: Apple Tree
description: A deciduous tree that produces crisp and juicy apples. Ideal for temperate climates and home gardens.

name: Orange Tree
description: A citrus tree producing sweet and tangy oranges packed with vitamin C. Perfect for sunny locations.

name: Lemon Tree
description: A small evergreen tree known for its bright yellow, sour fruits widely used in cooking and drinks.

name: Guava Tree
description: A hardy tropical tree producing fragrant and nutritious guava fruits rich in fiber and vitamin C.

name: Papaya Tree
description: A fast-growing tropical tree bearing soft, sweet papayas that aid digestion and boost immunity.

name: Coconut Tree
description: A tall tropical palm tree producing coconuts used for water, oil, and food.

name: Peach Tree
description: A deciduous fruit tree producing soft, sweet peaches during summer seasons.

name: Plum Tree
description: A compact fruit tree known for its juicy plums and beautiful spring blossoms.

name: Cherry Tree
description: A popular fruit tree producing sweet and tart cherries with stunning spring flowers.

name: Pineapple Plant
description: A tropical plant producing sweet and tangy pineapples, suitable for warm climates.

name: Olive Tree
description: A slow-growing tree valued for its olives and long lifespan, ideal for dry climates.

name: Pear Tree
description: A fruit-bearing tree producing sweet and juicy pears, suitable for home orchards.

name: Pomegranate Tree
description: A drought-tolerant tree producing antioxidant-rich pomegranates.

name: Jackfruit Tree
description: A large tropical tree producing the world's largest tree-borne fruit.

name: Avocado Tree
description: A nutrient-rich fruit tree producing creamy avocados used in many cuisines.

name: Lychee Tree
description: A tropical tree producing sweet, fragrant lychee fruits with rough red skin.

name: Fig Tree
description: A hardy tree producing soft and sweet figs, rich in fiber and minerals.

name: Date Palm
description: A desert-friendly palm tree producing sweet and energy-rich dates.
